title: Israeli Forces Move Into Gaza, 'Terrorist Tunnels' In Cross Hairs
teaser: NPR's Ari Shapiro reports on the latest news from the Gaza Strip, where Israel has undertaken a ground invasion against Hamas operatives. It's the first time in five years that the Israeli military has conducted a ground operation.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
